description:
As a fan of all things dexterity games, I’m always up for trying the newest crazy concept to arrive at Board Game Quest HQ. From flicking games like Ice Cool to stacking games like Rhino Hero, I love the uniqueness that dexterity games bring. And unique can definitely be applied to the game we are […]

title: Ixi Kix Review

description:
Gen Con week is here and it’s going to be quite a busy week. The majority of the BGQ team is going to be on-site covering the convention, so our posting schedule will be a little lighter than usual. But keep an eye out for our full convention recap next week. In the mean time, […]
